text:
Chaos Testing (Task #1) is complete. All tests pass.

**Summary**: 53 chaos tests across 4 files, all Section 4 Razor compliant (under 250 lines each).

**Test files**:
- `tests/chaos_resilience_test.rs` (168 lines, 13 tests) - IPC protocol fault injection: random bytes, truncated JSON, type confusion, extreme payloads, binary protocol chaos, token encoding edge cases
- `tests/chaos_stream_model_test.rs` (167 lines, 15 tests) - Token stream interruptions (sender/receiver drop, buffer overflow, rapid create/close), model loading failures (path traversal, nonexistent paths, directory escapes), tokenizer boundary conditions
- `tests/chaos_scheduler_shutdown_test.rs` (130 lines, 7 tests) - Queue flooding, concurrent enqueue/dequeue, expired request skipping, inference engine context/param validation, concurrent inference
- `tests/chaos_shutdown_health_test.rs` (241 lines, 18 tests) - Shutdown drain/timeout/concurrent tracking, health check under degraded/unhealthy states, resource limit enforcement (memory, concurrency, RAII release), connection pool concurrent stress, combined stress scenarios

**Changes from original**: Refactored the original 1084-line single file into 4 Razor-compliant files. Fixed binary roundtrip test (bincode doesn't support serde tagged enums). Added new tests: binary protocol chaos, tokenizer boundary conditions, resource zero/exact boundary. Merged some redundant resource tests.

Task #2 (Final QA) is now unblocked.
summary: Chaos testing complete - 53 tests, 4 files, all passing

text:
Task #1 (Chaos Testing) was already completed in my prior work session. Just re-verified: all 53 chaos tests pass across 4 files (13 + 7 + 18 + 15), all Section 4 Razor compliant.

Files:
- `tests/chaos_resilience_test.rs` (168 lines) - IPC protocol faults, binary protocol, token encoding
- `tests/chaos_stream_model_test.rs` (167 lines) - Streams, model loading, tokenizer boundaries
- `tests/chaos_scheduler_shutdown_test.rs` (130 lines) - Queue chaos, inference engine
- `tests/chaos_shutdown_health_test.rs` (241 lines) - Shutdown, health, resources, combined stress

The tokenizer integration (Task #3) surface area is already covered by my tokenizer boundary tests. No additional work needed.

I'm idle and available if there are additional tasks to assign.
summary: Chaos testing already complete, verified passing, idle
